description:
Join us for the ACCU summer social, where there will be good food and excellent company where we will put the C++ world to rights.

Please let me know if you can make it so I can book a large enough table :)

Hope to see you there.

location.address: The Beer Emporium, 15 King Street, BS1 4EF
location.name: Pepe Nero

title: ACCU Summer Social
